login.subscription_cancelled: Your subscription has been cancelled. Contact us:
login.integration_title: Want to connect LivoCare to your systems?
login.integration_description: We develop custom integrations and automations for your operation. Built-in API + expert team.
login.instagram_description: Stay updated with news, tips, and exclusive content about automation and technology for clinics.
login.session_invalidated: Your session was ended because you signed in on another device. Please sign in again.

home.contact_admin: Contact your administrator to get access to applications.

communication.title: Email & Communication

configurations.transcription_description: Manage your transcription usage and quota settings

transcription_usage.title: Transcription Usage
transcription_usage.subtitle: Track your transcription minutes and manage your monthly quota
transcription_usage.error_loading: Failed to load transcription usage data
transcription_usage.overage_warning: You have exceeded your monthly quota by {{overage}}
transcription_usage.language_settings_description: Choose the default language for processing your audio transcriptions.
transcription_usage.language_description: Select the default language that will be used to process your audio transcriptions. You can choose Portuguese (Brazil) or English (US).
transcription_usage.overage_description: If enabled, you can continue transcribing beyond your monthly limit. Additional charges may apply.
transcription_usage.detailed_usage_subtitle: View individual transcriptions with duration and cost
transcription_usage.quota_warning_message: You have used {{used}} of {{limit}} minutes ({{percent}}%). Consider managing your usage or increasing your limit.
transcription_usage.quota_exceeded_message: You have reached your monthly limit of {{limit}} minutes. Cannot start new transcription until next month. Contact your account manager to increase your limit.
transcription_usage.manage_subscription_description: Update your plan, payment method, or view invoices

trial_expired.title: Your trial period has ended
trial_expired.message: To continue using transcription features, choose a plan that fits your needs.

plans.title: Choose your plan

plans.questions_description: Our team is ready to help you choose the best plan.

header.logout_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to sign out?

bug_report.subject: Subject
bug_report.description_placeholder: Describe the bug in detail. Include steps to reproduce, expected behavior, and what actually happened...
bug_report.attachment_help: Images and videos (max 50MB each, up to 5 files)
bug_report.error_submit_failed: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

validation.new_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

media_library.description: Upload images and videos to use in public page editor components.
media_library.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
media_library.drag_drop: Drag and drop or click to select
media_library.formats_hint: Images: PNG, JPEG, SVG (max 5MB) • Videos: MP4 (max 20MB)

welcome.title: Welcome to Hub!
welcome.hub_description: Hub is your central management portal. From here you can launch your licensed applications, customize your brand, monitor your subscription, and explore templates — all in one place.
welcome.feature_apps_desc: Access all your licensed applications from the home screen. Single sign-on means no extra logins — just click and go.
welcome.feature_config_desc: Customize your branding (logo, colors, contact info), configure email delivery, manage your media library, and monitor your subscription and usage.
welcome.feature_marketplace_desc: Browse curated templates by specialty and import them to your TQ with one click. Ready-to-use documents and landing pages.
welcome.ready_description: These settings are optional but recommended. You can skip this wizard and configure everything later from the Settings page.
welcome.intro: This wizard will guide you through setting up your brand identity. Configure your logo, colors, contact information, and media to personalize your experience.
welcome.setup_media: Upload background media for landing pages

logo_step.title: Your Logo
logo_step.description: Your logo appears on documents, emails, and reports sent to clients. A clear, high-quality image ensures your brand looks professional.
logo_step.supported_formats: Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, SVG. Max 5MB.
logo_step.drag_drop: Drag and drop an image file, or click to browse
logo_step.not_image: The selected file is not a valid image.

brand_colors.title: Brand Colors
brand_colors.description: These colors are used in email templates, documents, and landing pages. Choose colors that match your brand identity.
brand_colors.tip: Default colors are LivoCare's brand colors. You can reset them anytime from Settings.

company_info.title: Company Information
company_info.description: This information is displayed in email footers and on documents sent to your clients.
company_info.social_links_helper: Click an icon to add a link

media.title: Media Library
media.description: Upload images and videos to use as backgrounds on your document landing pages. These are used in the landing page editor.

final.email_description: You can configure your own SMTP server, or use LivoCare's free email service that is already configured and ready to use.
final.marketplace_description: Browse curated templates by specialty and import them to your TQ with one click.
final.ready_description: Your Hub is ready to use. Access these settings anytime from the Configurations menu in the sidebar.
final.ready_sso: Login to TQ is automatic — no extra credentials needed
final.email_patient_from: Your patient will receive e-mails from:
final.ready_support: Click the support icon in the top menu for human help
final.ready_password: Change your temporary password — click the key icon in the sidebar
final.ready_ai: AI 24/7 support is available inside TQ — test it out!

resume.title: Continue Setup?
resume.description: Resume the setup assistant when ready.

marketplace.title: Template Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Browse curated templates by specialty and import them to your TQ
marketplace.preview_disclaimer: This is a generic preview. Import to see it with your brand's colors, logo and settings.
marketplace.lp_preview_note: Structural preview — the actual landing page will be fully rendered after import.
marketplace.empty_description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new templates.

mobile.desktop_only_description: This feature is available on tablet or computer
